title: Tell me about a memorable experience related to pets.

korean: 예전에 친구네 강아지 돌봐준 적이 있는데, 정말 특별한 경험이었어.
친구가 여행 가는 동안 이틀 정도 맡아 달라고 해서 그러겠다고 했어.
처음엔 낯을 가려서 내 옆에 안 오더라고.
시간이 지나니까 조금씩 다가오더니 나중엔 무릎에 앉기도 했어.
산책 시킬 때 줄을 잡고 공원 다니는데, 책임감이 느껴졌어.
밤에 자는데 옆에서 자는 모습이 너무 사랑스러웠어.
아침에 일어나니까 꼬리 흔들면서 반겨주는 게 진짜 귀여웠어.
밥 주고 물 갈아주고 하면서 보람도 느꼈어.
친구가 데려갈 때 헤어지기 아쉬워서 눈물 날 뻔했어.
그 경험 이후로 반려동물 키우고 싶은 마음이 더 커졌어.
english: Before, I took care of a friend's dog, and it was, like, a really special experience.
My friend asked me to take care of it for about two days while traveling, so I said okay.
It was a small poodle, and it was really cute and gentle.
At first, it was shy and didn't come near me.
I tried to become friends by giving it treats.
As time passed, it gradually approached and later even sat on my lap.
When I walked it holding the leash in the park, I felt, you know, a sense of responsibility.
At night when sleeping, the sight of it sleeping next to me was so lovely.
In the morning when I woke up, it greeted me wagging its tail, which was really cute.
I felt rewarded while feeding it and changing its water.
When my friend picked it up, I was, like, so sad to part that I almost cried.
After that experience, my desire to have a pet grew even more.
